documents.document: To all the "Christians" condemning refugees to destitution and death, you God is watching and you will have to answer for your callousness.
@MrTommyCampbell with every fiber of my being.
@TeddysReturn @AP I was referring to the "murder political opponents" part. Rioting is unacceptable.
@TeddysReturn @AP exaggerate much?
Students riot. POS speaker cancelled. Trump says university sanctioned/sponsored the riot, threatens them. Three things, all wrong.
@nytimes rioting is bad. Attempting to normalize his commentary is also bad. This was a bad response to a horrible excuse of a person.
@realDonaldTrump you're implying this was a university-sponsored riot as opposed to a group of students acting on their own. Evidence?
@orgfarmer @ElmaRomero15 @Lovedialysis seriously. She's like the most un-Jesus, self-proclaimed lover of Jesus. Hilarious.

For the first time, I can't WAIT for the President to go on vacation. We all need a break.
It's #BlackHistoryMonth. If your schools are anything like the one my kids attend, they'll learn little to nothing. Teach them yourself.
@Reuters pretty sure no one should reference poll numbers for a while given their recent uselessness. I trust Twitter polls more.
@CNNPolitics do better. You are playing into his reality-TV themed presidency. Don't be complicit in making a mockery of our democracy.
You guys keep this #boycott thing going and you'll be off the grid in no time. https://t.co/LvwJ3oovH6
@FoxNews 10,000 Jobs WORLDWIDE, not just here in the US. Read, people.
@kellycat1 @JulieFauble @JessicaValenti many women use birth control for medical conditions. You probably think sex is only for procreation

@Evan_McMullin these days, standing on principles is frowned upon & cynicism/bitterness viewed as rebellion. Take it w/a grain of salt.
@Wallace01S @FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer @FoxNews I never blamed Trump but with some her music, blaming her seems legit.
@jimsciutto "Trumo" is the best part of this tweet. #TyposMatter
@USATODAY "previously-vetted, approved refugees granted waiver to enter under Trump EO". #FactsMatter #WordsMatter

@JamesK097 you're coming for the wrong one. I am opposed to Muslim and refugee bans. Not sure what you're reading.

@cnni he campaigned a Muslim ban and spoke often on refugees. White evangelicals don't get to act offended by this. YOU voted for this.

@FreitagT15 that doesn't directly risk lives.
@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer for me, comments that advance unsubstantiated fear are harmful.
@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer correct. I believe President has a duty to understand impact and not fuel it.
@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer he spoke to PM already. I'm speaking broadly, not specific to this incident
@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer @TinaSisti @Wallace01S I'm not saying that at all. Ignoring the impact of commentary is disingenuous.
@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer @TinaSisti @Wallace01S it would make an impact for the President to denounce, given current climate. Words matter
@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer @TinaSisti @Wallace01S free speech and hate speech dunt occupy the same category

@FreitagT15 @Winning_Deer @TinaSisti @Wallace01S Trump and camp do nothing to correct misinformation and hate from supporters. That matters
